title: We love: fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
description: Vogue’s new immersive exhibition, novelty knits and keepsake jewellery Continue reading...
author: Jo Jones and Helen Seamons
excerpt: Vogue’s new immersive exhibition, novelty knits and heirloom keepsake jewellery
text: Terminal velocityInventing the Runway is a new immersive exhibition at London’s Lightroom, exploring the history of the fashion runway show, from the intimate couture salons of the early 20th century to the unforgettable spectacles of the present. The show will utilise Vogue’s remarkable archive to bring together the industry’s leading voices from the past, present, and future. Narrated by Cate Blanchett. Tickets: £25 for adults and from £15 for students (13 November 2024-26 April 2025) lightroom.uk
html:
Terminal velocity

Inventing the Runway is a new immersive exhibition at London’s Lightroom, exploring the history of the fashion runway show, from the intimate couture salons of the early 20th century to the unforgettable spectacles of the present. The show will utilise Vogue’s remarkable archive to bring together the industry’s leading voices from the past, present, and future. Narrated by Cate Blanchett. Tickets: £25 for adults and from £15 for students (13 November 2024-26 April 2025) lightroom.uk
